function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on outdated guidelines for controlling COVID-19 transmission in workplaces.","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to SARS-CoV-2 and higher likelihood of COVID-19 outbreaks among workers.","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of international and local guidelines, and prompt implementation of updated recommendations.","Technologies":"Updated communication technology for quick dissemination of new guidelines.","People":"Employers, health professionals, and workers in the workplace.","Owner":"Employers, health professionals, and workplace safety committees."},{"Description":"Lack of expert team for the implementation of effective control measures in the workplace.","Impact":"Inefficient response to COVID-19 risks, leading to higher likelihood of transmission and outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Establishment of an expert team trained in infectious disease control and workplace safety, regular review of control measures.","Technologies":"Training and collaboration tools for the expert team, digital platforms for monitoring and reporting on control measures.","People":"Employers, health professionals, workplace safety committees.","Owner":"Employers and workplace safety committees."}]}
